data.author: dominikn
data.message: using firmware 0.10.0 with micro-ros-agent selection with buttons

data.author: Dominik Nowak
data.message:
Ros2 rosbot utils (#89)

- new `rosbot_utils` ROS 2 package with a `flash_firmware` ROS 2 node
- added almost all dependencies instead of `stm32flash` to `package.xml` files
- flashing the firmware not only over the SBC pin headers but also over the USB-B through the FTDI (rear panel)
- include the `firmware-0.9.0.bin` that works with a Micro ROS Agent not only over the SBC pin header, but also USB-B

data.author: Dominik Nowak
data.message:
Ros2 combined microros (#88)

Included MicroROS Agent and new launch file that brings up both ROSbot ROS driver and Micro ROS Agent
